issues.title: TotalPrimaryMass_lb freezes after first step in Regime 2/3

issues.one_line_rca: Startup SG draining trigger now executes at the ~200F threshold in deterministic Stage D validation without regression.

issues.title: SG secondary pressure response does not begin at RCP circulation onset; rise is delayed until near-boiling
issues.one_line_rca: SG pressure-source behavior now establishes pre-boil inventory-derived response without floor reversion before boiling transition.

issues.title: SG startup boundary behavior is modeled isolated where references indicate steam-line warmup/open-path behavior.
issues.one_line_rca: SG startup boundary remains open-path through startup windows, matching the documented steam-line warmup contract.

issues.title: Missing condenser + feedwater return module and startup permissive boundary contract (C-9/P-12) for steam-dump integration
issues.one_line_rca: Condenser/feedwater/permissive module set is integrated and validated with C-9 assertion and P-12 bypass policy active in runtime.

issues.title: Condenser startup orchestration and SG sink-authority coupling incomplete after CS-0115 staged implementation
issues.one_line_rca: Missing condenser startup orchestration and SG sink-authority coupling were completed and validated in the final IP-0046 rerun.
